revised_title: Advancements and Future Prospects in Optical and Infrared Spectroscopy
tldr: This article discusses the advancements and future prospects of optical and infrared spectroscopy, highlighting the impact of tunable lasers and Fourier transform methods. It also explores the potential of combining these techniques with polarization labelling and astronomical spectroscopy for more complex spectral analysis. The article emphasizes the importance of spectroscopy in understanding matter, detecting rare atomic species, and improving laser technology.
